topic.title: EMS Injury Incident Description Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Observations concerning a patient's injury mechanism

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.17"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67800-3" EMS injury incident description Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section" (CONF:10914)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10916)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10917)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Cause Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.50)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10919)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Mechanism (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.51)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10921)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Trauma Center Criteria (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.52)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10923)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Risk Factor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.53)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10925)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Impact Area (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.54)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10927)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Location In Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.55)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10929)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Occupant Safety Equipment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.56)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10931)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Airbag Deployment Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.57)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10933)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.58)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10935)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.59)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67800-3" EMS injury incident description Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section" (CONF:10914)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10916)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10917)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Cause Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.50)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10919)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Mechanism (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.51)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10921)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Trauma Center Criteria (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.52)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10923)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Injury Risk Factor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.53)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10925)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Impact Area (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.54)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10927)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Location In Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.55)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10929)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vehicle Occupant Safety Equipment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.56)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10931)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Airbag Deployment Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.57)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10933)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.58)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:10935)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.59)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.17"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2140229"/> <code code="67800-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS injury incident description Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title>Injury Incident Description Section</title> <text/> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.50"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="848335286"/> <code code="69543-7" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Cause of injury NEMSIS"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.51"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="612363222"/> <code code="67494-5" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="General mechanism of the forces which caused the injury NEMSIS"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN">
